Introduction
============

LFC Page is the default HTML page content type for `LFC`_, a Content Management
System (CMS) based on Django.

See `LFC`_ for more information.

.. _`LFC`: http://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-lfc

Changes
=======

1.0.1 (2014-06-25)
------------------

* Removes zope.interface
* Updates README.txt

1.0 (2014-06-17)
----------------

* Initial public release
